title: Secret Meeting
detail_text: <:th_ch0107/>Honoka-san.... This is the thing zura<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>T-, this is that Noppo bread! Can I eat it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>By all means<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>*Munch*.... Hnnn~...., delicious! It’s really good, Hanamaru-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Isn’t it! This is Numazu’s proud soul food zura!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Then, this is the one I brought. It’s the one currently trending in Tokyo....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Waaah, so pretty zura~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Ah, Emma-san said that she’s also going to bring bread, you know?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>So, that means that we might be able to eat Kasumi-chan’s bread rolls?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>It’s possible!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
